definition[0]: an important job, piece of work, or activity that you are responsible for
example[0]: Starting a new business can be a risky undertaking.
example[1]: Both organizations gave an undertaking to curb violence among their members.
example[2]: The railwayâ€™s commercial undertaking was divided into its separate elements.
example[3]: the parent company and its subsidiary undertakings
definition[4]: a promise to do something, especially one that has legal force
example[4]: He gave an undertaking that he would repay the money in full.
